events.message: I received the wrong item in my order and would like to request a refund for the incorrect product as soon as possible.
The customer issue has been categorized as a refund request for processing the wrong product shipment.
Assigning customer support agent Sarah Johnson to handle the refund case for the customer query.
Hello, I’m Sarah from customer support. I’m here to help you with your refund request for the incorrect item you received.
Could you please provide your order number and a photo of the item you actually received so we can verify the issue?
Sure, my order number is 789456123, and I have attached the photo showing the wrong product delivered instead of the headphones I ordered.
Thank you for the details. We will process your refund immediately and you should see the amount credited back within 5 to 7 business days.
Thanks for the quick response and confirmation. I appreciate the help and look forward to the refund.
Your refund request has been fully processed and resolved. Please check your account in the upcoming days for the refund credit.
We wanted to check in and confirm that you have received your refund and if there is anything else we can assist you with.
With your confirmation of the refund receipt, we are now closing this case. Thank you for contacting customer support.
A customer satisfaction survey has been sent to gather your feedback about your recent support experience.
